item.title: Globis Acquisition Corp 10-K
item.description: Globis Acquisition Corp, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 31, 2021 had 26537 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 727 instances combination - 509 instances may - 445 instances company - 358 instances initial - 311 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
